assets.description: Using provided live action green screen footage of Rihanna, we created animated backgrounds in After Effects and composited it all in Flame.
assets.title: Rihanna Rude Boy

assets.description: The video is a sequence of close-up and medium-distance shots of various camera speeds and focus.  The goal was to show the band rocking onstage as the Haunt-generated chaos rains down around them with various explosions and debris around them enhancing the message of sadistic glee that bleeds through the song. We worked closely with the production company, Partizan and handled all the VFX and Flame work for the project.
assets.title: Big Pink Dominoes

assets.description: TMark Ronson and Daniel Merriweather pair up for a song that brings enough tears to fill the streets. We worked with director Matt Lenski to create an original flash animation that would sit over footage, while helping to dive into the overall narrative.  Creative director Mark Szumski interpreted a method to help show an extra element that wouldn't overpower the overall performance.
assets.title: Mark Ronson

assets.description: From the mind of Tim Saccenti, we worked on CGI and original character animation for this impeccably shot and edited music video for Animal Collective. The team used an original character study to build out 3D textures and animation for the final piece.
assets.title: Peacebone
